item.title: Wildy Help
item.dc:creator: @kyled123 kyled123
item.description:
@kyled123 wrote:

in my server i was trying to make places non wildy, i found this.

public boolean Wild() {
if((absX <= 3249) ||
(absX >= 3258) ||
(absY <= 3415) ||
(absY >= 3424))
return true;
else
return false;
}

is that how i make places non wildy? because in my server there is no non wildy places, i wanna make varrock, edgeville and magebank pking, but i want the towns of edgeville and varrock to be safe zone - until you step in wildy. can someone help me , i never ever did understand this .[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 10, 2008, 02:02:53 AM[/size][hr]come on someone, anyone, please help me fix this i reallllly need help!

Read full topic
